analysis.Summary: LabelGooglePlay.vue is a Vue single-file component that renders a static SVG Google Play badge.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable Google Play Store label/icon to be displayed wherever the download badge is needed in the application.

Components.name: LabelGooglePlay
Components.responsibility: Renders the SVG markup for the Google Play badge; no props or reactive state.

analysis.Usage:
Import in other Vue components or pages:

  import LabelGooglePlay from 'modules/icons/labels/LabelGooglePlay.vue'

and then use in template:

  <LabelGooglePlay />
Notes: This file has no <script> or <style> sections; it is purely presentational.
All colors are driven by CSS custom properties for easy theming.
The SVG is fully inline, avoiding external asset requests.
No props or dynamic behavior; if customization is needed, wrapping or forking may be required.
